name: phonebook-backend
description: Backend of the Phonebook project from Fullstack open course: https://fullstackopen.com

scripts.build-ui: rm -rf build && cd ../part2/phonebook/ && npm run build --prod && cp -r build ../../phonebook-backend
scripts.deploy-full: npm run build-ui && git add . && git commit -m uibuild && git push && npm run deploy

author: Alisher Aliev (AlishStrong)
